name: OpenCortex.ai
description: A data visualization app for data scientists and curious people. Built with ArcGIS API for JavaScript, serving data over Esri and NASA maps of earth in 3D.

name: Cleanly.so
description: Cleanly is an iOS, Android, and Web app that washes your car at your place: home, work - wherever you are. Don't feel like searching google maps for the nearest carwash? Cleanly is here to help!

name: Matchy.dev
description: Mobile game inspired by match-three vintage games and Kurzgesagt. Ported to WebGL 2.0 via WebAssembly, and hosted online.
